price: Na kabisa usiwe miongoni mwa wale wanao zikanusha Ishara za Mwenyezi Mungu, usije kuwa katika walio khasiri.
arabic: وَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ
footnotes: Wala usiwe wewe, wala yeyote katika wanao kufuata, miongoni mwa wanao kadhibisha hoja na Ishara zilio wazi, msije mkaingia khasarani na ghadhabuni, kama hali ya makafiri wasio amini. Na akisemezwa Nabii basi ndio wanasemezwa wote wanao mfuata.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walā takūnanna mina alladhīna kadhabū biāyāti al-lahi fatakūna mina al-khāsirīna
